title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5308.3 - Waive
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5308.3 - Waive

State Regulations

Upon petition by a gaming facility licensee in accordance
with Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law section 1328(13), the
commission may exempt arrangements otherwise included within the definition of
"junket" from compliance with this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5308.3

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
